page.title: 08EDUCATION:PACKED LUNCHES
page.content: AT{CHICKERELL COUNTY PRIMARY SCHOOL} YOU EITHER HAVE TO TAKE{PACKED LUNCHES TO{SCHOOL}OR GO{HOME}DURING THE LUNCH BREAK BECAUSE IN{JULY 1980}THE{SCHOOL {CANTEEN}HAD TO CLOSE BY{GOVERNMENT} ORDER. IN THE{WINTER}WE EAT IN THE{CANTEEN} AND DURING THE SUMMER WE ARE ALLOWED TO HAVE OUR{LUNCH}IN THE{FIELD}.WE ARE SUPERVISED BY DINNER LADIES. THE{SCHOOL SUPPLY FREE DINNERS}FOR SOME PEOPLE.THOSE{SANDWICHES}ARE MADE OUT OF{CORN BEEF, HAM}OR{CHEESE}.FOR SWEET BISCUITS WE EITHER HAVE{ {'KIT-KATS','MILKY WAYS'}OR{'PENGUINS'} .THERE IS ALSO{FRUIT}LIKE{APPLES, {PEACHES,BANANAS, PEARS, ORANGES, {GRAPES}AND{PLUMS}. MOST PEOPLE HAVE THEIR{LUNCHES}IN {PLASTIC FOOD BOXES}AND A{HOT}OR{COLD {DRINK}IN A{FLASK.
